study_plan_entry.title: Research Seminar in Computer and Communication Sciences

free_text.Learning outcomes: To become acquainted with the research projects offered by the labs that participate in EDIC[br/]
free_text.Content: Every week a different lab will give an introduction to its current research projects[br/]
free_text.Note: Attendance to all sessions mandatory to get the credit[br/]
